Articles.Content:
> 
> If there are 2 months of these "hype threads" so help me Jupiter I will rage.

\*Rolls out rage train...

![All-aboard-the-rage-train.jpg](http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101008232402/borderlands/images/4/4e/All-aboard-the-rage-train.jpg)
![42924-haters-gonna-hate-train-gif-wyvW.gif](http://img.pandawhale.com/42924-haters-gonna-hate-train-gif-wyvW.gif)

HYPE:

![zWgULVG.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/zWgULVG.png?1)

Time lapse image of riding the hype train.

![rpruoqnjy2dwcpbfayga.gif](http://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/t_original/rpruoqnjy2dwcpbfayga.gif)

\*wakes up from his hidey hole in the N-Xth car, where N is directly proportional to the amount of hype and X is the number of people posting in this thread that they don't understand why we need a hype thread\*

What? People on the train? Sweet! Let's get this going!
Just poasting to say I'm getting off the train.

I'm ready!http://imgur.com/KOhqERa

![KOhqERa.jpg?1](http://i.imgur.com/KOhqERa.jpg?1)

> 
> Considering you are a historian and reference Jupiter, how did peoples get hyped in Ancient Rome without trains?

By using Hype-slave Galleys

edit:

Although Imerators used a Forced Hype-March and, in rare cases where Hype wasn't to expected levels, they would order a Hype-Decimation.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-03T04:06:58Z" title="04/03/2015 04:06  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 3, 2015</time> by Invader Myk**
hypehypehypehypehypehypehypehypehypehypehypehypehypehypehypehypehypehypehypehypehypehypehypehypehype

I wasn't going to post any hype in a hype thread, but then... I realized I *can't* post any, because... 

![4my6SfL.gif](http://i.imgur.com/4my6SfL.gif)

**HYPE!**

![CaoFj4g.png](http://i.imgur.com/CaoFj4g.png)

Thank everyone so much for all of this hype just for my Vostok replica:

[![hfOWQSM.png](http://i.imgur.com/hfOWQSM.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113309-Applied-mad-rocket-science-division-%28TAKING-REQUESTS%29)

> 
> Just poasting to say I'm getting off the train.

![4dd0c09.gif](http://reaction.club/r/4dd0c09.gif)

![dlCKqHI.gif](http://i.imgur.com/dlCKqHI.gif)
Take it easy on the reaction images please ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Just poasting to say I'm getting off the train.

You shall never escape the train

The train is eternal

The hype consumes all
Does anyone have a greasemonkey config to filter out all the hype? It's popping up everywhere now.
1.0 has everything i wish for in official release except a cataloging system for sorting variants and crafts. I will suffer to browsing through 50 crafts in SPH or VAB.

Can we have a list of all the comfirmed fixed bugs for the official 1.0 release of this product?

Pretty please?
I bought my ticket to the hype-train! Woohoo!

Get me more Hype train tickets! Take my funds!!!! Can I preorder tickets for later updates?

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> can i lick him while he drives?

Wait, WHAT.

HHHHHHHHHHHYYYYYYYYYYYYYPPPPPPPPPPPPPEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

One ticket please \*hands over all funds for spot in "economy" class\*

I'm more exited for 1.1, the (expected, so dont quote me on this) first version with Unity 5.

Unity 5 = Stable 64-Bit

Stable 64-bit = MANY MODS

Many mods= Toasted RAM

> 
> Can we have a list of all the comfirmed fixed bugs for the official 1.0 release of this product?
> Pretty please?

Yes, but it may take a few weeks/months to compile the list.

> 
> Just poasting to say I'm getting off the train.

It's a long walk to the station, I might say. You might respond with something like "KSP 0.90 is perfectly fine for my purposes." And then we'd laugh.

That sux this threaded was stolen from GregroxMun, pretty sure he is the conductor of the hype train.

Can't wait for 1.0!
